statements: SELECT * FROM irrigation_zones WHERE slope > 3.0;
SELECT id, soil_type FROM irrigation_zones WHERE sun_exposure = 'full sun';
SELECT * FROM irrigation_zones WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT soil_type, slope, sun_exposure FROM irrigation_zones WHERE soil_type = 'clay';
SELECT id, sun_exposure, slope FROM irrigation_zones ORDER BY sun_exposure DESC, slope ASC;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_zones WHERE soil_type = 'Sandy';
SELECT id, slope FROM irrigation_zones WHERE sun_exposure = 'High' ORDER BY slope DESC;
SELECT id, soil_type, slope, sun_exposure FROM irrigation_zones WHERE slope BETWEEN 2.0 AND 4.5;
SELECT id, soil_type FROM irrigation_zones WHERE sun_exposure IN ('High', 'Moderate') AND slope < 3.0;
SELECT id, soil_type, sun_exposure FROM irrigation_zones WHERE soil_type LIKE 'Loam%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_information;
SELECT soil_type, soil_texture FROM soil_information WHERE soil_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM zone_information ORDER BY slope DESC;
SELECT zone_name, soil_type FROM zone_information JOIN soil_information ON zone_information.soil_id = soil_information.soil_id;
SELECT * FROM zone_information WHERE sun_exposure = 'Full Sun' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM soil_information WHERE soil_type = 'Clay'
SELECT zone_name, slope FROM zone_information WHERE sun_exposure = 'Full Sun'
SELECT soil_id, soil_type, soil_texture FROM soil_information ORDER BY soil_type ASC
SELECT * FROM zone_information WHERE slope > 5
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zone_information
SELECT * FROM soil_information;
SELECT soil_id, soil_type FROM soil_information WHERE soil_type = 'clay';
SELECT slope_degree, slope_classification FROM slope_information ORDER BY slope_degree DESC;
SELECT sun_intensity, sun_duration FROM sun_exposure WHERE sun_intensity > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM soil_information JOIN slope_information ON soil_id = slope_id;
SELECT soil_type, moisture_level FROM soil_information WHERE soil_type = 'Clay';
SELECT * FROM slope_information ORDER BY slope_degree DESC;
SELECT slope_classification, slope_degree FROM slope_information WHERE slope_degree > 5 ORDER BY slope_classification ASC;
SELECT sun_intensity, sun_duration FROM sun_exposure WHERE sun_intensity > 0.5 AND sun_duration < 8 ORDER BY sun_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_information WHERE soil_type = 'Sandy' OR (moisture_level >= 0.3 AND moisture_level <= 0.7);
SELECT * FROM soil_information
SELECT soil_type, soil_moisture_level FROM soil_information
SELECT slope_id, slope_degree, slope_aspect FROM slope_information
SELECT exposure_id, sun_intensity, sun_direction FROM sun_exposure
SELECT zone_name, slope_id, soil_id FROM irrigation_zones
SELECT * FROM soil_information;
SELECT zone_name, soil_type, soil_moisture_level FROM irrigation_zones WHERE slope_id = 1 ORDER BY soil_moisture_level DESC;
SELECT zone_name, sun_intensity, sun_direction FROM irrigation_zones INNER JOIN sun_exposure ON irrigation_zones.exposure_id = sun_exposure.exposure_id WHERE sun_intensity > 50;
SELECT zone_name, slope_degree FROM irrigation_zones INNER JOIN slope_information ON irrigation_zones.slope_id = slope_information.slope_id WHERE slope_degree < 5 ORDER BY zone_name ASC;
SELECT soil_id, soil_type, slope_aspect FROM soil_information INNER JOIN slope_information ON soil_information.soil_id = slope_information.slope_id WHERE soil_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM SoilType;
SELECT id, name FROM Slope WHERE slope_angle > 10;
SELECT zone_name, description FROM Zone WHERE soil_type_id = 2;
SELECT id, exposure_type, description FROM SunExposure ORDER BY exposure_type DESC;
SELECT zone_name, start_time, end_time FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Zone WHERE id = 1;
SELECT zone_name, soil_type_id FROM Zone WHERE slope_id = 3 ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT z.zone_name, s.description, st.name FROM Zone z INNER JOIN Slope s ON z.slope_id = s.id INNER JOIN SoilType st ON z.soil_type_id = st.id;
SELECT z.zone_name, s.description, se.exposure_type FROM Zone z JOIN Slope s ON z.slope_id = s.id JOIN SunExposure se ON z.sun_exposure_id = se.id;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE start_time > '08:00:00' AND end_time < '18:00:00' ORDER BY zone_id ASC;
